message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.NE 

This paper is about using deep convolutional neural networks for automated pancreas segmentation in medical images. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also discusses various techniques for improving the accuracy of the segmentation, such as hierarchical classification and post-processing using conditional random fields, which are common topics in machine learning (cs.LG and cs.AI). Additionally, the paper deals with medical imaging, which falls under the category of multimedia (cs.MM). Finally, the use of deep learning models for segmentation is a popular application of neural networks, which is covered in the category of neural and evolutionary computing (cs.NE).
